_header: I never saw maiden and with my eye
_description: A lover’s lament — one monorhyming quatrain

BLAdd60577.Transcription:
I neuer saue maden & wythe my eyethat dyde lowe so
                    fathfullyAnd sche woe not agayn loue methen for pure sorowe must I now
                    dyefare wel louyr
BLAdd60577.Facsimiles:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             “Introduction.” 
             The Winchester Anthology. A Facsimile of British Library Additional
                Manuscript 60577. With an account of the music by
